level.heading: Report to the Council.
level.text: On or before March 1 of each year, the Central Collection Unit shall issue a report to the Mayor and the Council that includes:
The amount of delinquent debt collected in the preceding fiscal year;
The amount of uncollected delinquent debt owed to the District; and
A summary of the efforts made to collect delinquent debt owed to the District and the challenges that remain for collecting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-168, see notes under ยง 1-350.01.
